long_description: Launch off the lip and find a rhythm all your own with the women's Blizzard Samba skis. They attack any terrain with rocker designed to reduce chatter on hard snow and maneuver well in soft snow. Blizzard builds the rocker without bending the core, creating a naturally flexing, responsive ski that turns easily, resists high-speed chatter and shreds crud and pow. Light camber underfoot assists with grip on hardpack. Layered wood core designed specifically for advanced female skiers creates a lightweight, snappy ski with smooth handling. Fiberglass reinforcement laid in 4 separate directions increases snappiness and power underfoot. Sidewalls direct power right to the edges of the skis, resulting in quick side-to-side response. Blizzard Samba skis feature 98mm waists that require bindings with wide brakes.
short_description: Launch off the lip and find a rhythm all your own with the women's Blizzard Samba skis. They attack any terrain with rocker designed to reduce chatter on hard snow and maneuver well in soft snow.
